designs.name: Playful Modern Children’s Bedroom
designs.description: Bright, cheerful space designed for fun, learning, and comfort
designs.flooring: Soft laminate wood with colorful play mats
designs.walls: Pastel painted walls with playful murals
designs.ceiling: Flat ceiling with star LED lights
designs.furniture: Single bed with storage, study desk, toy cabinet, bookshelf
designs.decor: Wall stickers, educational posters, soft toys, colorful rug
designs.prompt_keywords: playful kids bedroom, colorful modern children room, fun interiors

designs.name: Space Theme Children’s Bedroom
designs.description: Imaginative space-themed bedroom encouraging curiosity and creativity
designs.flooring: Dark laminate flooring with soft rugs
designs.furniture: Rocket-shaped bed, study table, storage drawers
designs.decor: Planet models, astronaut art, moon lamp
designs.prompt_keywords: space theme kids bedroom, galaxy children room, creative design

designs.name: Princess Fairytale Bedroom
designs.description: Magical fairytale-inspired bedroom for imaginative play
designs.walls: Soft pink walls with castle illustrations
designs.decor: Fairy lights, crown decor, plush cushions
designs.prompt_keywords: princess kids bedroom, fairytale room design, magical interiors

designs.name: Jungle Adventure Bedroom
designs.description: Nature-inspired adventurous bedroom full of energy
designs.furniture: Low bed, open shelves, study desk
designs.decor: Animal figurines, leafy plants, adventure posters
designs.prompt_keywords: jungle kids bedroom, adventure children room, nature theme

designs.name: Minimal Learning Bedroom
designs.description: Clean and organized bedroom focused on study and calmness
designs.walls: Neutral off-white walls with learning boards
designs.lighting: Bright study lights, soft ambient lighting
designs.furniture: Single bed, ergonomic study desk, bookshelf
designs.decor: Wall calendar, pin board, small plants
designs.prompt_keywords: minimal kids bedroom, study focused children room, clean design

designs.name: Sports Theme Children’s Bedroom
designs.description: Energetic sports-inspired bedroom for active kids
designs.furniture: Single bed, sports locker storage, desk
designs.decor: Sports posters, trophies shelf, wall decals
designs.prompt_keywords: sports kids bedroom, active children room, energetic design

designs.description: Art-focused bedroom encouraging creativity and expression

designs.name: Nature Calm Children’s Bedroom
designs.walls: Soft green walls with nature prints
